      Constructors 
      Constructor Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void avoid​(double distance)
      this method is used to call the color classification and detect the color of the can and avoid the can during the travelling state
      void constructMap​()
      construct an array which contain a list of points which car will visit and do the research
      void leftAvoid​()
      the method help the car turn right,and determine whether need to test the color again,called by avoid function
      int predictPath​()
      this method is used to determine the turning direction depends on the position of the car,call by avoid function
      void RightAvoid​()
      the method help the car turn right,and determine whether need to test the color again,called by avoid function
      void search​()
      the program will call the constructMap() method to generate the searchMap, the car will visit the point on the map one by one
      void travelSearch​(double distance)
      when found a can when rotation, the car will stop and move to in front of the can and do the research
      void travelTo​(double x, double y)
      the car will navigate to the point (x*tileSize,y*tileSize)
      void travelToSearchArea​()
      travel to the left-lower point of search area
      void travelTunnel​()
      the car will travel to near the tunnel ,do the localization and go through the tunnel
      void turnSearch​()
      after the car reach the visit point in the search map, car will rotate about 360 to see if there is any can near the car
      void turnTo​(double theta)
      turning to a certain degree,call by travelTo()
      void work​()
      this function is the primary function in the navigation class,it calls other function to reach the destination

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo​(double x,
                     double y)
              throws OdometerExceptions
        the car will navigate to the point (x*tileSize,y*tileSize)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • avoid

        public void avoid​(double distance)
           throws OdometerExceptions
        this method is used to call the color classification and detect the color of the can and avoid the can during the travelling state
        Parameters:
        distance - the detected distance by us sensor
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo​(double theta)
        turning to a certain degree,call by travelTo()
        Parameters:
        theta - target degree

      • predictPath

        public int predictPath​()
        this method is used to determine the turning direction depends on the position of the car,call by avoid function
        Returns:
        the turning direction 1 means right ,0 means left

      • RightAvoid

        public void RightAvoid​()
                throws OdometerExceptions
        the method help the car turn right,and determine whether need to test the color again,called by avoid function
